name: Homemade Spinach Pizza Rolls
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Take your pizza upscale and impress your family or guests with these tasty, bite-size pinwheels.
ingredients: Reynolds Wrap® Non Stick Aluminum Foil
directions: Line a large baking sheet with Reynolds Wrap® Non-Stick Aluminum Foil; sprinkle with cornmeal
Brown sausage in large skillet on medium-high heat
Unroll pizza dough onto prepared baking sheet
Carefully stretch or roll dough into a 13x10-inch rectangle
Arrange sausage on dough to within 1/2 inch of the edges
Sprinkle with 1/2 cup of the mozzarella
Top with the remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella and the Parmesan
Starting from a long side, roll up dough to make a 13-inch-long loaf
Pinch seam and ends to seal
Place loaf, seam side down, on the prepared baking sheet
Using a sharp knife, cut four 2-inch slits in top for steam to escape
Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown
If necessary, cover the last 5 minutes of baking to prevent overbrowning
Remove from oven and slice into rounds to serve with pizza sauce
